titleInfo.title: Title from envelope: __Formal Portrait of the Sosne Family

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5.5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On front of matting: ''Elite Studio, Denver, Colo.'' Handwritten on back of photograph: '' Gift of Mrs. Ben Bockla (Nina Sosne, daughter of ? Sosne), 2783 W. 14th Ave., Sosne Family, Gert Sigman (16), Anna Cohan (13), Lottie Craig (10), Mrs. Abramson - Rachel Sosne mother (45), Sara Stein (19) Margaret Sosne, niece, circa 1913.''

mods.abstract: Formal portrait of Rachel Sosne (Mrs. Abraham Sosne) and her daughters Gert Sosne Sigman, Anna Sosne Cohan, Lottie Sosne Craig and Sara Sosne Stein. Members of the Sosne family ran the Capitol Wet Wash Laundry on West Colfax Avenue in Denver, Colorado.

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Families and Groups

mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
